question: Which temple hosts the annual Brahmakalashotsava Festival of Karnataka?
explanation: Shri Durgaparameshwari Temple, Kateel hosts the annual Brahmakalashotsava Festival of Karnataka. Temple-town Kateel, one of the pilgrimage centres in the coastal belt of Karnataka having the highest footfall hosts the 13-day Brahmakalashotsava celebrations of Durgaparameshwari Temple.
